name: sadelbrid
body:
## "Flight" Now Available! ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sadelbrid/sadelbrid.github.io/master/flightmenu.png)
Flight is an environment where you control a paper airplane. Collect the notes in the wind and let them tell a story that is open for your own interpretation. This environment is inspired by the musical works of Adam Young, each scene representing a lyrical theme. "Flight" isn't a game, but rather an environment. Relax.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
